scripts.postinstall: pnpm run download-hrea-obs && pnpm run download-hrea-specification && pnpm run download-hrea-agent && pnpm run download-hrea-planning && pnpm run download-hrea-proposal
scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "cd ui && pnpm start" "pnpm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir && cd tests && pnpm t
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/acfn.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.package: pnpm run build:happ && pushd ui && pnpm run package && popd && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.package2: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: pnpm run build:zomes && hc dna pack dnas/acfn/workdir && hc app pack workdir
scripts.clean:hrea-modules: rimraf workdir/hrea_observation.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_specification.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_agent.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_planning.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_proposal.dna
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules; for DIR in $(find -type d -iname node_modules); do echo "  Remove $DIR"; rm -Rf "$DIR"; done
scripts.clean:build: rimraf target; rm dnas/acfn/workdir/acfn.dna; rm workdir/acfn.happ
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build; pnpm run clean:build-cache; pnpm run clean:hrea-modules; pnpm run clean:modules
